item.title: Snappy
item.description: Description What is Snappy? Snappy was created during the Covid pandemic to make wearing a mask a more elegant solution. The normal approach in the pandemic was to take a mask everywhere you go and anytime someone comes close or you enter a building, you had to pop on your mask. This has two major problems: you could forget your mask at home and you need two free hands to place it over your nose.
